pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Governor of Nevada Brian Sandoval | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Brian Sandoval, Governor of the State of Nevada.

The Prime Minister offered his condolences to the Governor for the loss of life and injuries that resulted from the mass shooting in Las Vegas, Nevada.

The Prime Minister also expressed his appreciation for the quick reaction by the first responders and the assistance provided to the Canadian victims of the shooting.
